jasima.core.random.continuous

类 DblErlang

  • java.lang.Object
    • jasima.core.random.continuous.DblStream
      • jasima.core.random.continuous.DblErlang
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class DblErlang
extends DblStream
    Implementation of the Erlang distribution. It is the distribution of a sum of shape independent exponential variables each with mean scale.

    The Erlang distribution is a special case of the Gamma distribution (with the shape parameter being restricted to an integer. For shape=1 it is the same as the Exponential distribution.

    作者:
    Torsten Hildebrandt
    另请参阅:
    Erlang distribution (Wikipedia), Erlang Distribution (MathWorld), 序列化表格
